title: Ralph Northam
added: A law signed by Northam in 2020 tasked the [[Virginia Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services|Virginia Board of Agriculture and Consumer Services]] with establishing new state regulations for pet stores.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://wset.com/news/at-the-capitol/northam-signs-state-budget-law-decriminalizing-simple-marijuana-possession|author=Elizabeth Tyree|title=Northam signs state budget, law decriminalizing simple marijuana possession|work=WSET|date=May 21, 2020|accessdate=November 29, 2020}}</ref>

title: Ralph Northam
added: A law signed by Northam in 2020 tasked the [[Virginia Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services|Virginia Board of Agriculture and Consumer Services]] with establishing new state regulations for pet stores.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://wset.com/news/at-the-capitol/northam-signs-state-budget-law-decriminalizing-simple-marijuana-possession|author=Elizabeth Tyree|title=Northam signs state budget, law decriminalizing simple marijuana possession|work=WSET|date=May 21, 2020|accessdate=November 29, 2020}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://blueview.org/2020/08/05/pet-shops-get-standards-inspections-under-new-law/|author=Susan Laume|title=Pet shops get standards, inspections under new law|work=The Blueview|publisher=Fairfax County Democratic Committee|date=August 5, 2020|accessdate=November 29, 2020}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://lis.virginia.gov/cgi-bin/legp604.exe?201+cab+SC10211SB0891+RCSB2|author=David W. Marsden|title=SB 891 Animal welfare regulations; keeping of dogs, cats, and rabbits.|work=Virginia's Legislative Information System|accessdate=November 29, 2020}}</ref>

title: Ralph Northam
added: Abillsigned by Northam in 2020 tasked the [[Virginia Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services|Virginia Board of Agriculture and Consumer Services]] with establishing new state regulations for pet stores, and to enforce those regulations, the bill created the position of State Animal Welfare Inspector.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://wset.com/news/at-the-capitol/northam-signs-state-budget-law-decriminalizing-simple-marijuana-possession|author=Elizabeth Tyree|title=Northam signs state budget, law decriminalizing simple marijuana possession|work=WSET|date=May 21, 2020|accessdate=November 29, 2020}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://blueview.org/2020/08/05/pet-shops-get-standards-inspections-under-new-law/|author=Susan Laume|title=Pet shops get standards, inspections under new law|work=The Blueview|publisher=Fairfax County Democratic Committee|date=August 5, 2020|accessdate=November 29, 2020}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://lis.virginia.gov/cgi-bin/legp604.exe?201+cab+SC10211SB0891+RCSB2|author=David W. Marsden|title=SB 891 Animal welfare regulations; keeping of dogs, cats, and rabbits.|work=Virginia's Legislative Information System|accessdate=November 29, 2020}}</ref>
